EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell APAC Business Aviation Newsletter - December Edition
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> APAC BUSINESS AVIATION NEWSLETTER December 2017 TAKE OFF Honeywell Expands Connected Aircraft Support at New GoDirect Service Center
New Connectivity Integration Lab within GoDirect Service Center provides around-the-clock technical support to keep business jets connected... Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2017/september/honeywell-expands-connected-aircraft-support-at-new-godirect-service-center]]> Honeywell Enhances Customer Experience With New MyAerospace E-Commerce Website
Customer feedback helps build a more intuitive online experience that provides the industry’s best solution for managing aircraft repair and overhaul... Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2017/october/honeywell-enhances-customer-experience-with-new-myaerospace-e-commerce-website]]> Honeywell Engines Reach More Than 225 Million Flight Hours
Honeywell’s strong legacy in engine technology continues to evolve with its HTF7000, TFE731 and TPE331 engines... Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2017/october/honeywell-engines-reach-more-than-225-million-flight-hours]]> Honeywell's Business Aviation Forecast Projects 8,300 Deliveries Valued at $249 Billion Through 2027
2018 deliveries are projected to be slightly higher than 2017, with low single-digit growth supported by new models’ entry into service... Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2017/october/honeywell-s-business-aviation-forecast-projects-8-300-deliveries-valued-at-$249-billion-through-2027]]> Honeywell Launches UAV Industrial Inspection Service, Teams With Intel On Innovative Offering
New commercial UAV inspection service will be offered through a collaboration with Intel Corporation, helping infrastructure industries grow and serve customers faster in the digital age... Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
